sect4.title: libtool
sect4.para: libtool provides generalized library-building support services.

sect4.title: libtoolize
sect4.para: libtoolize provides a standard way to add libtool support to a package.

sect3.title: Library Files
sect3.para: libltdl.a, libltdl.so (link to libltdl.so.3.1.0), libltdl.so.3 (link to libltdl.so.3.1.0) and libltdl.so.3.1.0

sect4.title: libltdl, libltdl.so.3, libltdl.so.3.1.0
sect4.para: A small library that aims at hiding, from programmers, the various difficulties of dlopening libraries.
